title: Credit growth continues to outpace deposit growth in FY'25 as well
description: Significantly the  growth in deposits as well as credit was lower than the year ago period reflecting  a slowdown in economic activity due to the uncertainty  on the economic outlook because of the Lok Sabha elections. Year-on-year credit and deposit growth in the same period of 2023-24 was higher at 16.3  percent and 12.9 percent respectively.
